headline: How Lowe's New Affirm Buy‑Now‑Pay‑Later Partnership Will Impact Lowe's Companies (LOW) Investors
summary: Earlier this week, Affirm and Lowe's announced a partnership to offer buy-now-pay-later options, including 0% APR installment plans for eligible customers, across Lowe's website and mobile app, while featuring Lowe's prominently in Affirm's marketplace. This move gives Lowe's shoppers more transparent and flexible ways to fund bigger home projects, while potentially widening Lowe's reach to new, financing-focused customers browsing through Affirm's platform.
